topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.1: Using HPE Helion OpenStack Dashboards

section.title: Undercloud Horizon Dashboard
section.p: Review the following topics related to the undercloud Horizon dashboard:
Undercloud Horizon Overview The undercloud Horizon dashboard is the management interface for the undercloud.
Undercloud Horizon Dashboard: Settings Tab Configure user settings and change passwords
Manage Overcloud Configuration Define the configurations for ESX Clusters, StoreVirtual Backends, and StoreServ Backends.
Compute Service Work with flavors, images and servers.
Manage Resources Define the configurations for the compute and storage resources
Updates and Extensions Downloading and publishing content and updates.
Working with Virtual Environment(s) Configure, manage and control multiple virtual instances.
Working with Storage Configure storage by adding and registering HPE StoreVirtual Clusters and HPE 3PAR StoreServ.
Working with HPE StoreVirtual VSA Configure HPE StoreVirtual VSA cluster as storage.
Working with ESX Clusters Register vCenter and import clusters form the registered vCenter for use in your cloud.
Working with StoreServ Backends Add, expand, shrink, delete StoreServ backends, generate Cinder configuration, and update the overcloud.
Working with HPE 3PAR StoreServ Configure HPE 3PAR StoreServ as storage, ensure accessiblity from the undercloud, and register a device.
Working With StoreVirtual Backends Add, expand, shrink, delete StoreServ backends, generate Cinder configuration, and update the overcloud.
Command Line Interface- EON Use the EON client CLI package to manage ESX services.
